protocol.text: Siliques were harvested from the plants at 18-19 days after pollination and immediately frozen until RNA extraction

Plants were grown on soil containing a mixture of substrate and vermiculite (3:1) in Elbanton growth cabinets (Elbanton BV, Kerkdriel, the Netherlands) under long day conditions (16 h light at 22oC and 8 h dark at 16oC).
Extraction of RNA was performed using RNAqueous columns (Ambion, Austin, TX, USA).
Biotinylated cRNA was prepared according to the standard Ambion protocol from 1 ug total RNA (MessageAmp II-Biotin Enhanced Kit, 2008, Ambion).

After fragmentation, 12.5 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45 degrees Celsius on GeneChip ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained with Fluidics Script FS450_004 in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G.

Processing and statistical analysis of the microarray data were done in Expressionist Pro v5.1 (Genedata AG, Basel, Switzerland). We used the GC-RMA algorithm for background correction, normalization and probe summarization. Various quality metrics were examined to exclude quality problems.
